definitions.definition: The periodic discharging of the menses , the flow of blood and cells from the lining of the uterus in unfertilized females of humans and other primates .
An instance of menstruation , the part of each month during which a fertile woman menstruates .

main_definition: The periodic discharging of the menses , the flow of blood and cells from the lining of the uterus in unfertilized females of humans and other primates .
secondary_definitions: An instance of menstruation , the part of each month during which a fertile woman menstruates .
